GameTech.description: Amazon GameLift Servers is a managed service for deploying, operating, and scaling dedicated game servers for session-based multiplayer games. Amazon GameLift Servers makes it easy to manage server infrastructure, scale capacity to lower latency and cost, match players into available game sessions, and defend from distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks. You pay for the compute resources and bandwidth your games actually use, without monthly or annual contracts.
